Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress Parkway, Racine and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/95th
ShortDescription: 3 King buses temp. rerouted NB: State, 87th, and King Drive; SB: King Drive, 87th, Lafayette, 95th and Michigan due to street blockage near King Drive/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/95th due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 87th, and King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 87th, Lafayette, 95th and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
